availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Nathan Humphreys and Elizabeth Humphreys. Married to Mary Humphreys. Father of Evaline Humphreys. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Anderson County, Subdivision 16, p. 54B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 7, p. 462.
